traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The ssurran can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

traits.name: Intellect Fortress
entries: The ssurran's AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The ssurran makes two Claw attacks and uses Defile (if available).

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Defile {@recharge}
entries: Ordinary vegetation within 10 feet of the ssurran withers and dies. In addition, each creature within 10 feet of the ssurran must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10 damage) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The ssurran regains 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points for each creature that fails the saving throw.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The ssurran casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:
